                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 1 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>একটি বস্তুর তিনটি স্থানের ওজনের অনুপাত 1:9:16। ঐ তিনটি স্থানে তিনটি স্প্রিং এ আলাদা আলাদাভাবে তিনটি বস্তু ঝুলালে তিনটি স্প্রিং একই পরিমাণ প্রসারিত হয়। বস্তুগুলোকে একই পরিমাণ টেনে ছেড়ে দিলে স্থান তিনটিতে পর্যায়কালের অনুপাত কত হবে?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>

padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-88" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-89" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; vertical-align: -0.897em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.402em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mfrac><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">T</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">T</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mfrac><mo>=</mo><msqrt><mfrac><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mfrac></msqrt><mo>=</mo><msqrt><mfrac><mn>9</mn><mn>1</mn></mfrac></msqrt><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>;</mo><mfrac><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">T</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">T</mi><mn>3</mn></msub></mfrac><mo>=</mo><msqrt><mfrac><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mfrac></msqrt><mo>=</mo><msqrt><mfrac><mn>16</mn><mn>9</mn></mfrac></msqrt><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>4</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-2">\rm \frac{T_1}{T_2}=\sqrt{\frac{g_2}{g_1}}=\sqrt{\frac{9}{1}}=3;\frac{T_2}{T_3}=\sqrt{\frac{g_3}{g_2}}=\sqrt{\frac{16}{9}}=\frac{4}{3}</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-3-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>T</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>:</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>T</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>:</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>T</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>12</mn><mo>:</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>:</mo><mn>3</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-91" style="width: 11.232em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 9.182em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.355em, 1009.14em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-92"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-93" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-94" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.15em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.7em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-95" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">T</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.74em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-96" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-97" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">:</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-98" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.15em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.7em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-99" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">T</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.74em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-100" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-101" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">:</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-102" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.15em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.7em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-103" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">T</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.74em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-104" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-105" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-106" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">12</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-107" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">:</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-108" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">4</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-109" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">:</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-110" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; </span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 3 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-4-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mi>sin</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03C9;</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi></mrow><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mi>cos</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>&amp;#x03C9;</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mfrac><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi><mn>4</mn></mfrac></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-111" style="width: 17.476em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 14.309em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.343em, 1014.16em, 2.796em, -999.998em); top: -2.308em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-112"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-113"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.971em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.43em, 1000.52em, 4.1em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-114" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.836em; left: 0.523em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-115" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-116" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-117" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">a</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-118" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.151em;">sin</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-119"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-120" style="padding-left: 0.151em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-121"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-122" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">ω</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-123" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">t</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-124" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-125" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.836em; left: 0.523em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-128" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-129" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-130" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">a</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-131" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.151em;">cos</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-132"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-133" style="padding-left: 0.151em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-134"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-135"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-136" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size1;">(</span></span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-137"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-138" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">ω</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-139" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">t</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-140" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">−</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-141" style="padding-left: 0.225em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.523em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.114em; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">π<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.859em, 1000.52em, 1.157em, -999.998em); top: -1.265em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; width: 0px; height: 2.312em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.498em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.548em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>ω</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi></mrow><mo>,</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>ω</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>4</mn></mfrac></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-4">\rm x_1=a\sin{\omega t},\ x_2=a\cos{\left(\omega t-\frac{\pi}{4}\right)}</script></span>&nbsp;তরঙ্গ দুটির মধ্যে দশা পার্থক্য কত?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-9-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mi>sin</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mfrac><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mi>&amp;#x03C9;</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mfrac><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi><mn>4</mn></mfrac></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>&amp;#x03C9;</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi><mn>4</mn></mfrac></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-167" style="width: 17.256em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 14.141em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.068em, 1013.98em, 2.543em, -999.998em); top: -2.047em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-168"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-169"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.53em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-170" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-171" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-172" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-173" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">a</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-174" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">sin</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-175"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-176" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-177"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-178"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-179" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size1;">(</span></span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-180"><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-181"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-184" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-185" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-205" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.535em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.609em, 1000.41em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.203em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-206" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">π<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-207" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.53em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.535em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-208" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size1;">)</span></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.051em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.602em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mi>ω</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>4</mn></mfrac></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>ω</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>4</mn></mfrac></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-9">\rm x_2=a\sin{\left(\frac{\pi}{2}+\omega t-\frac{\pi}{4}\right)}=asin{\left(\omega t+\frac{\pi}{4}\right)} </script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 4 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>SHM বিশিষ্ট কোনো কণার সাম্যাবস্থায় গতিশক্তি <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-10-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>5</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>J</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-209" style="width: 5.143em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.212em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.269em, 1004.17em, 2.386em, -999.998em); display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.237em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.232em, 1004.19em, 2.37em, -999.998em); padding-left: 0.23em;">×</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-265" style="padding-left: 0.23em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.96em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.19em, 1000.96em, 4.146em, -999.998em); top: -4.005em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-266"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-267"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-268" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.415em; left: 1.004em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-269"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-270"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-271" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-272" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-273" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">J</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.234em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.053em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.169em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>8</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mi mathvariant="normal">J</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-14">\rm 8\times{10}^{-3}J </script></span></p>
</label>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-15-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>2</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>J</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-274" style="width: 5.194em; top: -2.229em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-275"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-276" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-277" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; </label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>

                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-16-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>E</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>E</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>T</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-287" style="width: 10.822em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 8.855em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1008.86em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-288"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-289"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.158em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.66em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-290" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">E</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.809em; left: 0.699em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-291"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-292"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-293" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">k</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-294" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-295"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-296" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-297"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-298" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-299" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-300" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-301" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-302" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-303" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.273em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.66em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-304" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">E</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.699em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-305" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">T</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-306" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-307" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">5</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-308" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-309" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.969em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.95em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-310"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-311"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-312" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 0.986em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-313"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-314"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-315" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-316" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.602em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">E</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">E</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">T</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-16">\rm E_{k\ \left(max\right)}=E_T=5\times{10}^{-3}</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-17-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>E</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>p</mi></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>E</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>E</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>J</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-317" style="width: 17.707em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 14.51em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.191em, 1014.47em, 2.584em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-318"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-319" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⇒</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-320" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.15em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.66em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-321" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">E</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.699em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-322" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">p</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-323" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-324" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.15em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.66em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-325" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">E</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.699em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-326" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">k</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-327" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-328" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">5</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-329" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-330" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.969em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.95em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-331"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-332"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-333" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 0.986em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-334"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-335"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-336" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-337" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-338" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS; padding-left: 0.289em;">∴</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-339" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.15em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.66em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-340" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">E</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.699em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-341" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">k</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-342" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-343" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-344" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-345" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.969em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.95em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-346"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-347"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-348" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 0.986em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-349"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-350"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-351" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-352" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-353" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">J</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.398em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.502em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">E</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">p</mi></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">E</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mo>∴</mo><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">E</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mi mathvariant="normal">J</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-17">\rm \Rightarrow E_p+E_k=5\times{10}^{-3}\therefore E_k=2\times{10}^{-3}J</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 5 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>6 k স্প্রিং ধ্রুবক বিশিষ্ট একটি স্প্রিংকে 2:3&nbsp;অনুপাতে কাটা হলো। ছোট টুকরাটির স্প্রিং ধ্রুবক কত?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>

                                        </div>

                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-18-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>6</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi></mrow><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>15</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-354" style="width: 10.166em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 8.322em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.74em, 1008.32em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-355"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-356"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.215em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.49em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-357" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">k</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-358"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-359"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-360" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-361" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-362" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-363" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">l</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-364" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">l</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-365" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-366" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.199em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.363em, 1003.08em, 4.305em, -999.998em); top: -4.588em; left: 50%; margin-left: -1.555em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-367"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-368"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-369" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-370"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-371" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-372" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-373" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-374" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-375" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-376" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">6</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-377" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">k</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-378" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1003.2em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 3.199em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-379" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-380" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">15</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-381" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-382" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">k</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.852em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>×</mo><mn>6</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi></mrow><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>15</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-18">\rm k_{small}=\frac{\left(3+2\right)\times6k}{2}=15\ k </script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 6 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>পৃথিবীর দ্বিগুণ অভিকর্ষজ ত্বরণবিশিষ্ট গ্রহে সরল দোলক পৃথিবীর তুলনায়-</p>

                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-19-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2193;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>T</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2191;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-383" style="width: 3.117em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.543em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1002.54em, 2.297em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-384"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-385" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">g</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-386" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">↓</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-387" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">T</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-388" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">↑</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.203em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><mo stretchy="false">↓</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">T</mi><mo stretchy="false">↑</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-19">\rm g\downarrow T\uparrow </script></span></p>

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 7 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-20-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn><mi>sin</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi><mn>6</mn></mfrac></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-389" style="width: 10.36em; width: 0px; height: 2.312em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.498em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.593em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>6</mn></mfrac></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-20">\rm x=5\sin{\left(2t+\frac{\pi}{6}\right)}m</script></span>&nbsp;হলে, যখন কণাটির সরণ 3m, তখন বেগ কত হবে?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>

                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-23-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>8</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-431" style="width: 3.645em; </span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 8 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>একই প্রস্থচ্ছেদের ক্ষেত্রফলবিশিষ্ট এবং একই উপাদানের দুটি তারের দৈর্ঘে্যর অনুপাত 1:2। সমপরিমাণ বল প্রয়োগে এদের বিকৃতির অনুপাত-</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>

                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">

                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>

                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>1:2</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-26-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>Y</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>Y</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>F</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>F</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-494" style="width: 12.379em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 10.125em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1010.12em, 2.297em, -999.998em); font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.86em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.863em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-579" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-580" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.863em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.49em, 4.264em, -999.998em); top: -4.506em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.244em;"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-581"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.21em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-582" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">l</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.891em; left: 0.207em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-583" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.74em, 4.264em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.367em;"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-584"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.74em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.41em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-585" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">L</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.891em; left: 0.453em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-586" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.86em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.863em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-587" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">:</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-588" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.863em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.49em, 4.264em, -999.998em); top: -4.506em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.244em;"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-589"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.21em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.891em; left: 0.207em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-591" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.74em, 4.264em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.367em;"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-592"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.74em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.41em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-593" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">L</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.891em; left: 0.453em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-594" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.86em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.863em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-595" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-596" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-597" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">:</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-598" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">1</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.647em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.902em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">Y</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">Y</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mfrac><mrow><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">L</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mrow><mrow><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">L</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mrow><mrow><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mrow></mfrac><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mfrac><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">L</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">L</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mfrac><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mfrac><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">L</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mfrac><mo>:</mo><mfrac><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">L</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>:</mo><mn>1</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-27">\rm \therefore Y_1=Y_2\Rightarrow\frac{F_1L_1}{A_1l_1}=\frac{F_2L_2}{A_2l_2}\Rightarrow\frac{l_1}{L_1}=\frac{l_2}{L_2}\Rightarrow\frac{l_1}{L_1}:\frac{l_2}{L_2}=1:1</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 9 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>1.4mm ব্যাসার্ধ বিশিষ্ট কোনো তারের একপ্রান্তে <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-28-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>4</mn><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-599" style="width: 2.871em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.349em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.418em, 1002.35em, 2.573em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-600"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-601" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-602" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">π<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.316em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.184em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>4</mn><mi>π</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-28">\rm 4\pi\ kg</script></span> ভর সংযুক্ত করলে এর বিকৃতি কত হবে?&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit;                                                 <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-32-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>1000</mn></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-640" style="width: 2.234em; 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.15em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.15em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -1.147em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.252em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">Y</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">L</mi></mrow><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">L</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">Y</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>π</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>×</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">Y</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>4</mn><mi>π</mi><mo>×</mo><mn>9.8</mn></mrow><mrow><mi>π</mi><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>1.4</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>×</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>11</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mn>4</mn></msup></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-34">\rm Y=\frac{FL}{Al}\Rightarrow\frac{l}{L}=\frac{F}{AY}=\frac{mg}{\pi r^2\times Y} =\frac{4\pi\times9.8}{\pi\times\left(1.4\times{10}^{-3}\right)^2\times2\times{10}^{11}}=\frac{1}{{10}^4} </script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 10 </span>
                                        </div>

                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-38-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>F</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>6</mn></mrow></msup><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mn>6</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>16</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo>;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>F</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><msup><mi>&amp;#x03C9;</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>16</mn><mrow><mn>10</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mn>2</mn><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>0.4</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-771" style="width: 27.461em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 22.502em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1022.5em, 2.625em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-772"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-773" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">F</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-774" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-793" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-794" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">m</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-801"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.068em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.62em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.383em; left: 0.617em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-803" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-804" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">r</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-805" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-806" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">r</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-807" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-808" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.051em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.66em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.367em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-809" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">16</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.281em, 1001.93em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.523em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.941em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-810"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-811" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-812" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">×</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-813"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.658em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-814" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.301em; left: 0.371em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-815" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1002.05em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 2.051em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-816" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-817" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0.4</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-818" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-819" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.698em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.802em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>6</mn></mrow></msup><mo>×</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mn>6</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>16</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo>;</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><msup><mi>ω</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>16</mn><mrow><mn>10</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mn>2</mn><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>0.4</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-38">\rm F=4\times{10}^{-6}\times4\times{10}^6=16N\ ; F=m\omega^2r\Rightarrow r=\frac{16}{10\times2^2}=0.4\ m </script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 11 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>কোনো তারের আয়তন গুণাঙ্ক 3x এবং দৃঢ়তা গুণাঙ্ক 2x&nbsp;হলে পয়সনের অনুপাত-</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-43-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03C3;</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>K</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>6</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>K</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>9</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>4</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>18</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>5</mn><mn>22</mn></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-840" style="width: 11.027em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 9.018em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1009.02em, 2.502em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-841"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-842" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">σ<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-843" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-844" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.338em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1002.17em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.465em; left: 50%; margin-left: -1.105em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-845"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-846" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-847" style="font-size: 70.7%;
