clip: rect(3.404em, 1002.17em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -1.105em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-851"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-852" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">6</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-853" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">K</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-854" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-855" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-856" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">n</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1002.34em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 2.338em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-857" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-858" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.461em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1002.01em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.465em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.982em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-859"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-860" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">9</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-861" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-862" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-863" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-864" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1002.34em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -1.186em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-865"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-866" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">18</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-867" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-868" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-869" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-870" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1002.46em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 2.461em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-871" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-872" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.822em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-873" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">5</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.66em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.367em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-874" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">22</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.82em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.822em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.547em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.752em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>σ</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">K</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>6</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">K</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>9</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>18</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>5</mn><mn>22</mn></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-43">\rm \sigma=\frac{3K-2n}{6K+2n}=\frac{9x-4x}{18x+4x}=\frac{5}{22} </script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 14 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-45-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>2.1</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>11</mn></mrow></msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>P</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-888" style="width: 6.708em;                                         </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-47-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>3</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mn>9</mn></msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>J</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>/</mo></mrow><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mn>3</mn></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-914" style="width: 6.696em; </label>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>

clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.95em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1013"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1014"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1015" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 0.986em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1016"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1017"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1018" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">11</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1019" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size1;">)</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1020" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1021" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.502em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.158em, 1001.97em, 4.387em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1022"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1023" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1024" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">0.1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1025" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.506em; left: 2.051em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1026" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1027" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1028" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">1.5</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1029" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1030" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.436em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.95em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1031"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1032"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1033" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 0.986em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1034" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">9</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1035" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">J</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1036"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1037"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1038" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">/</span></span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1039"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.273em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.82em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1040" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.822em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1041" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.051em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.852em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">W</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">Y</mi><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">L</mi></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>11</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>0.1</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>1.5</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mn>9</mn></msup><mi mathvariant="normal">J</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>/</mo></mrow><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mn>3</mn></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-51">\rm W=\frac{1}{2}Y\left(\frac{l}{L}\right)^2=\frac{1}{2}\left(3\times{10}^{11}\right)\times\left(0.1\right)^2=1.5\times{10}^9J/m^3 </script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 15 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>0.5 kg ভরের বস্তু আনুভূমিকভাবে <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-52-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mn>4</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1042" style="width: 3.653em; top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1043"><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1044" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1045" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1046" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1047"><span style="display: inline-block;                                     </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-57-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>v</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>0.5</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mn>4</mn><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><msup><mn>2</mn><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1094" style="width: 16.723em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 13.691em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.822em, 1013.69em, 2.584em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1095"><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1096"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.29em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1097" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1098" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1099" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1100"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.49em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1101" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">v</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1102" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1103" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1104" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.29em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1105" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1106" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1107" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1108" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">k</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1109"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.53em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1110" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1111" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1112" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1113" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">k</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1114" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1115" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.215em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.281em, 1002.09em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -1.064em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1116"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1117" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">0.5</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1118" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">×</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1119"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.658em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1120" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.301em; left: 0.371em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1121" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.281em, 1000.66em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.523em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.326em;"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1122"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.658em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1123" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.301em; left: 0.371em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1124" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1002.22em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 2.215em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1125" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1126" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1127" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">N</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1128"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.805em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.82em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1129" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.822em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1130"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1131"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1132" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1133" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.647em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.952em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>0.5</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mn>4</mn><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><msup><mn>2</mn><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-57">\rm \frac{1}{2}mv^2=\frac{1}{2}\ kx^2\Rightarrow k=\frac{0.5\times4^2}{2^2}=2Nm^{-1} </script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                            <div class="row" style="margin-top:20px;">

                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-61-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1152" style="width: 2.37em; </label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>আণবিক ভর কম হলে বিচ্যুতি কম হবে।</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-69-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1214" style="width: 2.143em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.733em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.414em, 1001.73em, 2.37em, -999.998em); top: -2.229em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1215"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1216" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">H</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1217" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1218" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">l</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.234em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.053em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.003em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-69">\rm HCl </script></span></p>

                                </div>

                        </div>

                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>কোনো গ্যাসের তাপমাত্রা 5&nbsp;গুণ হলে গতিশক্তি কত গুণ হবে?</p>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-75-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>E</mi><mo>&amp;#x221D;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>T</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mfrac><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>E</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>E</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>T</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>T</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1252" style="width: 9.92em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 8.117em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.863em, 1008.08em, 2.584em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1253"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1254" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">E</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1255" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">∝</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1256" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">T</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1257" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1258" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.904em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.78em, 4.264em, -999.998em); top: -4.506em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.408em;"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1259"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.781em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.45em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1260" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">E</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.891em; left: 0.494em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1261" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.78em, 4.264em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.408em;"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1262"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.781em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.45em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1263" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">E</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.891em; left: 0.494em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1264" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.9em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.904em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1265" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1266" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.82em, 4.264em, -999.998em); top: -4.506em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.408em;"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1267"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.822em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.49em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1268" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">T</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.891em; left: 0.494em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1269" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.82em, 4.264em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.408em;"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1270"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.822em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.49em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1271" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">T</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.891em; left: 0.494em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1272" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.95em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1273" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1274" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">5</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.647em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.852em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">E</mi><mo>∝</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">T</mi><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mfrac><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">E</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">E</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">T</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">T</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-75">\rm E\propto T\Rightarrow\frac{E_2}{E_1}=\frac{T_2}{T_1}=5 </script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 22 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>একটি গ্যাসের আণবিক ভর 20&nbsp;হলে কত তাপমাত্রায় <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-76-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1275" style="width: 1.977em; top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1276"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1277" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">r</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1278" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1279" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span></span><span style="display: inline-block;                                     <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-82-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><msqrt><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>R</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>T</mi></mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>M</mi></mfrac></msqrt><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>T</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>200</mn></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>20</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>R</mi></mrow></mfrac><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>K</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>800</mn><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>R</mi></mrow></mfrac><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>K</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1319" style="width: 19.018em; font-family: MathJax_Main;">800</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.86em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.449em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1365"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1366" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1367" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">R</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.19em, 1.191em, -999.998em); overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.797em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><msqrt><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">R</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">T</mi></mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">M</mi></mfrac></msqrt><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">T</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>200</mn></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>×</mo><mn>20</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">R</mi></mrow></mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">K</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>800</mn><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">R</mi></mrow></mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">K</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-82">\rm C_{rms}=\sqrt{\frac{3RT}{M}}\Rightarrow T=\frac{{200}^2\times20\times{10}^{-3}}{3R}K=\frac{800}{3R}K </script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 23 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>একটি কাচের মার্বেলসহ নির্দিষ্ট ভরের গ্যাসের আয়তন <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-83-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>250</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mn>3</mn></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1369" style="width: 4.249em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.467em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.306em, 1003.47em, 2.386em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1370"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1371" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">250</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1372" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1373" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">c</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1374"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.269em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.43em, 1000.82em, 4.1em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1375" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.357em; left: 0.822em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1376" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.089em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.139em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>250</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mn>3</mn></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-83">\rm 250\ cm^3</script></span>। তাপমাত্রা স্থির রেখে চাপ দ্বিগুণ করলে গ্যাসের আয়তন দাঁড়ায় <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-84-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>130</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mn>3</mn></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1377" style="width: 4.249em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.467em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.306em, 1003.47em, 2.386em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1378"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1379" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">130</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1380" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1381" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">c</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1382"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.269em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.43em, 1000.82em, 4.1em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1383" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span style="display: inline-block; vertical-align: -0.089em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.139em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>130</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mn>3</mn></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-84">\rm 130\ cm^3</script></span>। মার্বেলের আয়তন কত?</p>

                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-86-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>20</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mn>3</mn></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1393" style="width: 3.645em;                                     <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-89-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>P</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>V</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>P</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>V</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mspace linebreak=&quot;newline&quot; /><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>P</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>250</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>P</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>130</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>10</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mn>3</mn></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1417" style="width: 24.182em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 19.797em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.158em, 1019.8em, 5.904em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1418"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 19.797em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.158em, 1011.15em, 4.387em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1420" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">P</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.699em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1421" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1422" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1423" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1424"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1425"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.74em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1427" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1428" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1429" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1432" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.109em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.62em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1433" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">P</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.699em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1434" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1435" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1436" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1437"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1438"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.191em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.74em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1439" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">V</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.74em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1440" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1441" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1442" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">x</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1443" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.076em, 1019.8em, 4.387em, -999.998em); top: -2.498em; left: 0em;"><span class="mspace" id="MathJax-Span-1444" style="height: 0em; vertical-align: 0em; width: 0em; display: inline-block; overflow: hidden;"></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1445" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⇒</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1446" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.109em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.62em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1447" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">P</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.699em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1448" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1449" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1450" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1451"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1452" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">250</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1453" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1454" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">x</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1455" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1456" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1457" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">2</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1458"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.109em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.62em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1459" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">P</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.699em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1460" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1461" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1462" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1463"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1464" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">130</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1465" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1466" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">x</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1467" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1468" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS; padding-left: 0.289em;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1469" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1470" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1471" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">10</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1472" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1473" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">c</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1474"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.273em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.82em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1475" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.822em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1476" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -2.198em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 3.152em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>−</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>−</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>250</mn><mo>−</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>130</mn><mo>−</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>∴</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>10</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mn>3</mn></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-89">\rm P_1\left(V_1-x\right)=P_2\left(V_2-x\right) \\ \Rightarrow P_1\left(250-x\right)=2P_1\left(130-x\right)\therefore x=10\ cm^3 </script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 24 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>SI এককে মোলার গ্যাস ধ্রুবক R এর মান কত?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>

                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>0.08</p>

                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">

                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                                            </div>

                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>8.316</p>

                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-90-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>8.32</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mn>7</mn></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1477" style="width: 5.421em;                                     <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>ক্ষারক রূপে :&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-95-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mo>+</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mo>+</mo></msup><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mo>+</mo></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1515" style="width: 8.732em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 7.133em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.068em, 1007.13em, 2.256em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1516"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1517"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.191em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.74em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1518" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">H</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.74em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1519" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1520" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">O</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1521" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1522" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.395em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.74em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1523" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">H</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.74em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1524" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1525" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">→</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1526" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.191em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.74em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1527" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">H</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.74em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1528" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1529"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.395em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.74em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1530" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">O</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.781em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1531" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.247em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.252em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi><mo>+</mo><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi><mo>+</mo></msup><mo stretchy="false">→</mo><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi><mo>+</mo></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-95">\rm H_2O+H^+\rightarrow H_3O^+</script></span></p>

<p>এসিড রূপে :&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-96-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mo>+</mo></msup><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1532" style="width: 8.322em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 6.805em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.068em, 1006.8em, 2.256em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1533"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1534"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.191em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.74em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1535" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">H</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.74em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1536" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1537" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">O</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1538" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">→</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1539" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.395em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.74em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1540" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">H</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.74em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1541" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1542" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1543" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">O</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1544"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.395em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.74em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1545" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">H</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.74em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1546" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.247em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.252em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi><mo>+</mo></msup><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi><mo>−</mo></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-96">\rm H_2O\rightarrow H^++OH^-</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-103-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>W</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>M</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0.2</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>28</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>5.6</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1607" style="width: 12.83em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 10.494em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1010.49em, 2.297em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1608"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1609" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">W</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1610" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1611" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">n</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1612" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">M</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1613" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1614" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0.2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1615" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1616" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">28</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1617" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1618" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">g</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1619" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1620" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">5.6</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1621" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1622" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">g</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.203em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">W</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">M</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0.2</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>28</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>5.6</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-103">\rm W=nM=0.2\times28\ g=5.6\ g </script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 29 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>একটি অজানা গ্যাসের ব্যাপন হার <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-108-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1664" style="width: 1.455em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.194em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.455em, 1001.19em, 2.498em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1665"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1666"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.194em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.206em, 1000.71em, 4.1em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1667" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">H</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.836em; left: 0.747em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1668" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.225em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.093em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-108">\rm H_2</script></span> গ্যাসের ব্যাপন হারের এক-চতুর্থাংশ। অজানা গ্যাসটির আণবিক ভর কত?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
