                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-109-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi><mi class=&quot;MJX-variant&quot; mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>&amp;#x2032;</mi></msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><msqrt><mfrac><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>M</mi><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>M</mi><mi class=&quot;MJX-variant&quot; mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>&amp;#x2032;</mi></mrow></mfrac></msqrt><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>4</mn></mfrac><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>M</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>16</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>32</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1669" style="width: 15.412em; top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1670"><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1671"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.576em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.363em, 1000.45em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.244em;"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1672"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.453em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.568em, 1000.25em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1673" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">r</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.26em; left: 0.289em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1674" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">′</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.568em, 1000.25em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.686em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.121em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1675" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">r</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.58em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; font-family: MathJax_Main; top: -4.014em; left: 0.535em;">−<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main; position: absolute; top: -4.014em; left: 0.207em;">−<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(2.748em, 1001.03em, 4.797em, -999.998em); top: -4.055em; left: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size2;">√</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1684" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1685" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1687" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1688" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1689" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">M</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1690" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1691" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">16</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1692" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1693" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1694" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1695" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">32</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.797em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mfrac><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi><mi class="MJX-variant" mathvariant="normal">′</mi></msup><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><msqrt><mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">M</mi><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">M</mi><mi class="MJX-variant" mathvariant="normal">′</mi></mrow></mfrac></msqrt><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>4</mn></mfrac><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">M</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>16</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>32</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-109">\rm \frac{r^\prime}{r}=\sqrt{\frac{M}{M\prime}}=\frac{1}{4}\Rightarrow M=16\times2=32 </script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 30 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>&nbsp;কোনো গ্যাসের সম্ভাব্যতম বেগ (a) ঐ গ্যাসের গড় গতিবেগের (v) কতগুণ?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>

                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-113-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msqrt><mfrac><mn>4</mn><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi></mfrac></msqrt></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1717" style="width: 2.279em;                                             </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">

top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.535em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.609em, 1000.86em, 3.895em, -999.998em); width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1755" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; </span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                            <div class="row" style="margin-top:20px;">
                                <h2>Higher Mathematics (15)</h2>
                            </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 31 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-115-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>p</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>q</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1756" style="width: 8.832em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 7.23em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.306em, 1007.19em, 2.535em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1757"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1758" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">p</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1759"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.971em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.43em, 1000.52em, 4.1em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1760" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.357em; left: 0.523em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1761" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1762" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1763" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">q<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1764" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1765" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1766" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">r</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1767" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1768" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.27em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.366em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">p</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">q</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-115">\rm px^2+qx+r=0</script></span> সমীকরণের একটি মূল অপরটির গুণাত্মক বিপরীত হবে যখন-</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-116-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>p</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>q</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1769" style="width: 2.962em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.416em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.642em, 1002.42em, 2.552em, -999.998em); top: -2.229em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1770"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1771" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">p</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1772" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.276em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1773" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.276em;">q<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.234em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.275em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.892em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">p</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">q</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-116">\rm p=q </script></span></p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-120-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mo>.</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>p</mi></mfrac><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>p</mi><mo>.</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1793" style="width: 8.199em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 6.723em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1006.64em, 2.584em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1794"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1795" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">α</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1796" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">.</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1797" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.576em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.29em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1798" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.568em, 1000.41em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.686em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.244em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1799" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">α</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.58em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.576em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1800" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1801" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.535em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.568em, 1000.25em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.121em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1802" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">r</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.568em, 1000.37em, 4.264em, -999.998em); top: -3.686em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.203em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1803" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">p</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.53em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.535em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1804" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1805" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">r</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1806" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1807" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">p</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1808" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">.</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.647em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.752em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>α</mi><mo>.</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mi>α</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">p</mi></mfrac><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">p</mi><mo>.</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-120">\rm \alpha.\frac{1}{\alpha}=\frac{r}{p}\Rightarrow r=p. </script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 32 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-121-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>4</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1809" style="width: 8.236em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 6.746em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.306em, 1006.71em, 2.424em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1810"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1811"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.971em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.43em, 1000.52em, 4.1em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1812" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.357em; left: 0.523em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1813" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1814" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1815" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.23em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-121">\rm x^2-4x+4=0</script></span> এর মূলদ্বয় <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-122-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1821" style="width: 0.784em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.635em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.678em, 1000.6em, 2.349em, -999.998em); width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.043em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.639em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>α</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-122">\alpha</script></span> এবং <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1825"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1826" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">β<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-124-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mi>&amp;#x03B2;</mi><mn>3</mn></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1827" style="width: 4.1em; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1832" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">+</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1833" style="padding-left: 0.225em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.045em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.169em, 1000.56em, 4.287em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1834" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">β<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.357em; left: 0.635em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1835" style="font-size: 70.7%; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.27em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.366em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mi>α</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mi>β</mi><mn>3</mn></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-124">\alpha^3+\beta^3</script></span> এর মান কত?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-125-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B2;</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mi>&amp;#x03B2;</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo>;</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1836" style="width: 8.977em; padding-left: 0.289em;">4</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1843" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1844" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1845" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">α</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1846" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">β<span style="display: inline-block; <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-126-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mi>&amp;#x03B2;</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B2;</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mi>&amp;#x03B2;</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B2;</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><msup><mn>4</mn><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3.4.4</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>16</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1852" style="width: 22.461em; top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1853"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1854"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.068em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.658em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1856" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1857" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1858" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; top: -4.506em; left: 3.199em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1870" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1871" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1880" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.207em;">β<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1881" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1882" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 0.494em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1885" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1886" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1887" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">16</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.552em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mi>α</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mi>β</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>α</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>β</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>α</mi><mi>β</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>α</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>β</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><msup><mn>4</mn><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>3.4.4</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>16</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-126">\rm \alpha^3+\beta^3=\left(\alpha+\beta\right)^3-3\alpha\beta\left(\alpha+\beta\right)=4^3-3.4.4=16</script></span></p>

<p>অথবা,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-127-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>4</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mn>2</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1890" style="width: 11.846em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 9.715em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1009.67em, 2.297em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1891"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1892"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.53em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1893" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1894" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1895" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1896" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">4</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1897" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1898" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1899" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">4</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1900" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1901" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1902" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1903" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1904" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1905" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1906" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1907" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1908" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.353em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mn>2</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-127">\rm x^2-4x+4=0\Rightarrow x=2,\ 2</script></span>&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-128-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B2;</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><msup><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mi>&amp;#x03B2;</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>16</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1909" style="width: 12.666em; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.658em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1920" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.068em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.58em, 4.346em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1923" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">β<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.617em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1924" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1925" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1926" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">16</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.353em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo><mi>α</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>β</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><msup><mi>α</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mi>β</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>16</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-128">\rm \therefore \alpha=\beta=2\Rightarrow \alpha^3+\beta^3=16</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">

vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.669em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mfrac><mn>3</mn><mn>4</mn></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-134">\frac{3}{4} </script></span></p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>

                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-140-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mn>1</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mn>2</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2060" style="width: 3.827em;                                     <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-143-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>26</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mo>&amp;#x2026;</mo><mo>.</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>;</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mfrac><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi></mfrac><mo>.</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mo>.</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>24</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mo>&amp;#x2026;</mo><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2093" style="width: 20.248em; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.576em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2119" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">.</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2120" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.166em;">α</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2121" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">.</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2122" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.166em;">α</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2123" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">r</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2124" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-2125" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.822em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.7em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.367em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2126" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">24</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2127" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.82em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.822em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2128" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">…</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2129" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">(</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2130" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">i</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2131" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">i</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2132" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.602em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mfrac><mi>α</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mi>α</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>α</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>26</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mo>…</mo><mo>.</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>;</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mfrac><mi>α</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi></mfrac><mo>.</mo><mi>α</mi><mo>.</mo><mi>α</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>24</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mo>…</mo><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-143">\rm \frac{\alpha}{r}+\alpha+\alpha r=\frac{26}{3}\ldots.\ \left(i\right);\  \frac{\alpha}{r}.\alpha.\alpha r=\frac{24}{3}\ldots(ii)</script></span>&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-144-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2133" style="width: 3.814em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.117em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.191em, 1003.08em, 2.133em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2134"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2135" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2136" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">α</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2137" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2138" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">2</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.098em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.953em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi>α</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-144">\rm \Rightarrow\alpha=2</script></span></p>

<p>(i) হতে,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-145-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>26</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mn>3</mn><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>10</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2139" style="width: 15.945em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 13.076em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1013.03em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2140"><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-2141"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; top: -3.686em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.121em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2143" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">r</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2152" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.82em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2158" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2159" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.602em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mfrac><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>26</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mn>3</mn><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>10</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-145">\rm \frac{2}{r}+2+2r=\frac{26}{3}\Rightarrow3r^2-10r+3=0</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-146-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>,</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2165" style="width: 5.945em; top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2166"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2167" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2168" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">r</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2169" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2170" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2173" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2174" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.602em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>,</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo>∴</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-146">\rm \Rightarrow r=3,\frac{1}{3}\ \therefore</script></span>&nbsp;&nbsp;মূলগুলো&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-147-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>,</mo><mfrac><mn>2</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mn>6</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2177" style="width: 3.977em;                                         <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>a এর মান কত হলে&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-148-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2188" style="width: 8.161em;                                     <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>4</p>

padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2269" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">a</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2270" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2271" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2272" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2273" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">a</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2274" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2275" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">6</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.552em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo>;</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>6</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-152">\rm P\left(x\right)=x^3+x^2+x+a\ ;\  
P\left(-2\right)=\left(-2\right)^3+\left(-2\right)^2+\left(-2\right)+a=0\Rightarrow a=6 </script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>

                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>যদি x&nbsp;বাস্তব সংখ্যা হয় তবে <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-153-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>5</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2276" style="width: 7.602em;                                         <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-154-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mn>7</mn><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>7</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2288" style="width: 24.182em; padding-left: 0.207em;">4</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2297" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2298" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2299" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">5</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2300" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2301" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2302" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2303" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2304" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size1;">(</span></span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2305"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2306"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.53em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2307" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2308" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2309" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2310" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2311" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2312" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2313" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">1</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2314" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size1;">)</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2315" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2316" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">7</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2317" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2318" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2319" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2320"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.445em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.158em, 1002.91em, 4.387em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2321"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2322" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2323"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2324" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2325" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2326" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">1</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2327" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.506em; left: 2.994em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2328" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2329" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2330" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">7</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.051em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.702em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mn>7</mn><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>7</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-154">\rm -2x^2+4x+5=-2\left(x^2-2x+1\right)+7=-2\left(x-1\right)^2+7</script></span></p>

<p>x এর যেকোন বাস্তব মানের জন্য&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-155-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2265;</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2331" style="width: 5.33em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.346em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1004.3em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2332"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2333"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.445em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.158em, 1002.91em, 4.387em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2334"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2335" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2336"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2337" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2338" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2339" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">1</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2340" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.506em; left: 2.994em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2341" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2342" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">≥</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2343" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.552em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>≥</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-155">\rm \left(x-1\right)^2\geq0</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-156-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2344" style="width: 0.658em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.535em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.6em, 1000.49em, 2.379em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2345"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2346" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.753em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-156">\therefore</script></span>&nbsp;সর্বোচ্চ মান&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-157-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2.0</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>7</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>7</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2347" style="width: 6.682em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 5.453em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.191em, 1005.45em, 2.174em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2348"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2349" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2350" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2351" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">2.0</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2352" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2353" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.002em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mn>2.0</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>7</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>7</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-157">\rm =-2.0+7=7</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-159-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x00B1;</mo><mn>1</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2370" style="width: 5.822em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.756em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1004.67em, 2.174em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2371"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2372"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.53em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2373" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2374" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2375" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2376" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">3</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2377" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2378" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2379" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">±</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2380" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.203em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>±</mo><mn>1</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-159">\rm x^2-3x=\pm1</script></span></p>

<p>এখন,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-160-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>&amp;#x00B1;</mo><msqrt><msup><mn>3</mn><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>4.1</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo>.</mo><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo></msqrt></mrow><mn>2.1</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>&amp;#x00B1;</mo><msqrt><mn>13</mn></msqrt></mrow><mn>2</mn></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2381" style="width: 20.002em; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.052em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>±</mo><msqrt><msup><mn>3</mn><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>4.1.1</mn></msqrt></mrow><mn>2.1</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>±</mo><msqrt><mn>5</mn></msqrt></mrow><mn>2</mn></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-161">\rm x^2-3x+1=0\Rightarrow x=\frac{3\pm\sqrt{3^2-4.1.1}}{2.1}=\frac{3\pm\sqrt5}{2}</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-162-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>&amp;#x00B1;</mo><msqrt><mn>13</mn></msqrt></mrow><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>.</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>&amp;#x00B1;</mo><msqrt><mn>5</mn></msqrt></mrow><mn>2</mn></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2459" style="width: 8.117em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 6.641em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.945em, 1006.64em, 2.666em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2460"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2461" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2462" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2463" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-2464" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.338em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.322em, 1002.22em, 4.264em, -999.998em); top: -4.506em; left: 50%; margin-left: -1.105em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2465"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2466" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2467" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">±</span><span class="msqrt" id="MathJax-Span-2468"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.314em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.7em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0.576em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2469"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2470" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">13</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1000.7em, 1.232em, -999.998em); top: -1.678em; left: 0.576em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.039em; border-top: 1.3px solid; width: 0.699em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.322em, 1000.62em, 4.264em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span><span style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">√</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); clip: rect(0.904em, 1002.34em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 2.338em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2472" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">.</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-2473" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.969em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.322em, 1001.85em, 4.264em, -999.998em); top: -4.506em; left: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">±</span><span class="msqrt" id="MathJax-Span-2477"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); clip: rect(3.322em, 1000.62em, 4.264em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span><span style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">√</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.97em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.969em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block;
