</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 38 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-163-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>5</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2481" style="width: 8.236em;                                             </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-167-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>7</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2526" style="width: 7.698em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 6.286em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.277em, 1006.24em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -2.229em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2527"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2528"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.959em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.463em, 1000.5em, 4.146em, -999.998em); top: -4.005em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2529" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.369em; left: 0.549em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2530" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2531" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.23em;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2532" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.23em;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2533" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.23em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2534" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.23em;">7</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2535" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.276em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2536" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.276em;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.234em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.164em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.225em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>7</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-167">\rm x^2-x-7=0 </script></span></p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>ধরি,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-168-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>5</mn><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>&amp;#x2026;</mo><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2537" style="width: 9.51em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 7.789em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1007.71em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2538"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2539"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.068em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.62em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2540" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">α</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.658em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2541" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2542" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2543" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">5</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2544" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">α</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2545" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2546" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2547" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2548" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2549" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">…</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2550" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">(</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2551" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">i</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2552" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.403em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mi>α</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>5</mn><mi>α</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>…</mo><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-168">\rm \alpha^2-5\alpha-1=0\ldots(i)</script></span></p>

<p>নতুন মূল,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-169-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2553" style="width: 10.002em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 8.199em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.191em, 1008.16em, 2.174em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2554"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2555" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2556" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2557" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">α</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2558" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2559" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2560" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2561" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">α</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2562" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2563" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2564" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2565" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">2</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.002em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>α</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi>α</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-169">\rm x=\alpha-2\Rightarrow\alpha=x+2</script></span></p>

<p>(i) এ বসিয়ে পাই,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-170-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>5</mn><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>7</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2566" style="width: 19.674em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 16.109em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1016.07em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2567"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2568"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.445em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.158em, 1002.91em, 4.387em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2569"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2570" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2571"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2572" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2573" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2574" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">2</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2575" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.506em; left: 2.994em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2576" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2577" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2578" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">5</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2579" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2580" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2581"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2582" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2583" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2584" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">2</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2585" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2586" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2587" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2588" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2589" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2590" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2591" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.53em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2592" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2593" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2594" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2595" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2596" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2597" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">7</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2598" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2599" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.552em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>5</mn><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>7</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-170">\rm \left(x+2\right)^2-5\left(x+2\right)-1=0\Rightarrow x^2-x-7=0</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 39 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-171-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>[</mo><mn>8</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mn>11</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>]</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2600" style="width: 3.318em; padding-left: 0.225em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2622" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">42</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2623" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2624" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.134em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.23em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>14</mn><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>55</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>42</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-172">\rm x^3-14x^2+55x-42=0</script></span>&nbsp;সমীকরণের কতটি পূর্ণসাংখ্যিক মূল রয়েছে?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>মূল হতে হলে পূর্ণসংখ্যাটিকে 42&nbsp;এর উৎপাদক হতে হবে। কিন্তু <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-173-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>[</mo><mn>8</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mn>11</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>]</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2625" style="width: 2.748em;                                         <br>

                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-176-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>50</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>624</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2659" style="width: 10.099em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 8.273em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.306em, 1008.24em, 2.424em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2660"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2661"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.971em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute;                                     <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>ধরি, মূল&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-177-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>50</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>24</mn><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>26</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2671" style="width: 20.863em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 17.092em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.355em, 1017.05em, 2.502em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2672"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2673" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">α</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2674" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-2675" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2676" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">α</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2677" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2678" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">2</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-2679" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2680" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS; padding-left: 0.289em;">∴</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2681" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2682" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">α</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2683" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2684" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2685" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2686" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">50</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2687" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2688" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">α</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2689" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2690" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">24</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2691" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS; padding-left: 0.289em;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2692" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">α</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2693" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2694" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2695" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2696" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">26</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.153em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>α</mi><mo>,</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>α</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo>∴</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>α</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>50</mn><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi>α</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>24</mn><mo>∴</mo><mi>α</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>26</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-177">\rm \alpha,\ \alpha+2\ \therefore2\alpha+2=50\Rightarrow\alpha=24\therefore\alpha+2=26</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>ধরি, সাধারণ মূল&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-180-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><msup><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>6</mn><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>&amp;#x2026;</mo><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2722" style="width: 11.682em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 9.551em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.232em, 1009.47em, 2.543em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2723"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2724" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">α</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2725" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS; padding-left: 0.289em;">∴</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-2726" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2727"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.068em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.62em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2728" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">α</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.658em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2729" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2730" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2731" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">6</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2732" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">α</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2733" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2734" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">a</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2735" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2736" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2737" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">…</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2738" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">(</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2739" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">i</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2740" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.403em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>α</mi><mo>∴</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><msup><mi>α</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>6</mn><mi>α</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>…</mo><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-180">\rm \alpha \therefore\ \alpha^2-6\alpha+a=0\ldots(i)</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-181-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>10</mn><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>&amp;#x2026;</mo><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2741" style="width: 10.822em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 8.855em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1008.77em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2742"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2743"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.068em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.62em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2744" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">α</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.658em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2745" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2746" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2747" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">10</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2748" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">α</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2749" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2750" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2751" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2752" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2753" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2754" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">…</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2755" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">(</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2756" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">i</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2757" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">i</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2758" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.403em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mi>α</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>10</mn><mi>α</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>…</mo><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-181">\rm \alpha^2-10\alpha+2a=0\ldots(ii)</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-182-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mn>4</mn><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mn>4</mn></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2759" style="width: 12.461em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 10.207em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.109em, 1010.21em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2760"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2761"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2762" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2763"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2764" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">i</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2765" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">i</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2766" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2767" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2768" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2769" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2770" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">i</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2771" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2772" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2773" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">4</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2774" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">α</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2775" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2776" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">a</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2777" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2778" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">α</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2779" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-2780" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.568em, 1000.37em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2781" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2782" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.453em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>−</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mn>4</mn><mi>α</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi>α</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mn>4</mn></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-182">\rm \left(ii\right)-\left(i\right)\Rightarrow4\alpha=a\Rightarrow\alpha=\frac{a}{4}</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-183-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mfrac><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mn>16</mn></mfrac><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mfrac><mn>3</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>8</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mn>8</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2783" style="width: 19.346em; top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2784"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2785" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-2786" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.822em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.322em, 1000.66em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.326em;"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2787"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.658em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.568em, 1000.37em, 4.141em, -999.998em); width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.66em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.367em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2790" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">16</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.82em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.822em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2791" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-2792" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2793" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.494em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2803" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2804" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2805" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.752em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo><mfrac><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mn>16</mn></mfrac><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mn>3</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>8</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>∴</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mn>8</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-183">\rm \therefore\frac{a^2}{16}-\frac{3}{2}a+a=0\Rightarrow a^2-8a=0\therefore a=0,\ 8</script></span></p>
</span>

                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-186-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>5</mn><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>9</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2850" style="width: 11.569em;                                     <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>তৃতীয় মূলটি&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-188-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>2</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2884" style="width: 1.969em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.6em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.191em, 1001.56em, 2.174em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2885"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2886" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2887" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2888" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">i</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.002em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>2</mn><mo>−</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-188">\rm 2-i</script></span></p>

<p>মূলসমূহের যোগফল&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-189-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2889" style="width: 9.756em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 7.994em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.191em, 1007.95em, 2.174em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2890"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2891" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2892" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2893" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2894" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2895" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2896" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">i</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2897" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2898" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2899" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2900" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">i</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2901" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2902" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">5</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.002em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>−</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-189">\rm =1+2+i+2-i=5</script></span></p>

<p>মূলসমূহের গুণফল&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-190-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2903" style="width: 9.264em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 7.584em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.109em, 1007.54em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2904"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2905" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2906" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">1</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2907" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2908" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2909"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2910" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2911" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2912" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">i</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2913" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2914" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2915" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2916"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2917" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2918" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2919" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">i</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2920" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2921" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>−</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-190">\rm =1\left(2+i\right)\left(2-i\right)=5</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 44 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>কোনো দ্বিঘাত সমীকরণের একটি মূল <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-191-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><msqrt><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn></msqrt><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2923" style="width: 7.453em; left: 0.263em;">−<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.094em, 1000.86em, 4.287em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">√</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2936" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.452em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.593em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>−</mo><msqrt><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn></msqrt><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-191">\rm\frac{1}{2}(-1-\sqrt{-3})</script></span> হলে সমীকরণটি-</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>দ্বিঘাত সমীকরণের মূল&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-196-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03C9;</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><msqrt><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn></msqrt></mrow><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><msup><mi>&amp;#x03C9;</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><msqrt><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn></msqrt></mrow><mn>2</mn></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2981" style="width: 11.764em; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1003.08em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 3.076em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.852em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>ω</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><msqrt><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn></msqrt></mrow><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>,</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><msup><mi>ω</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>−</mo><msqrt><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn></msqrt></mrow><mn>2</mn></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-196">\rm \omega=\frac{-1+\sqrt{-3}}{2},\ \omega^2=\frac{-1-\sqrt{-3}}{2}</script></span></p>

<p>সমীকরণ,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-197-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>&amp;#x03C9;</mi><mo>+</mo><msup><mi>&amp;#x03C9;</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>+</mo><msup><mi>&amp;#x03C9;</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-3011" style="width: 10.781em;                                         <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-201-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>8</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-3070" style="width: 6.723em; top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3071"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-3072"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3074" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3075" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3076" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">a</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3077" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3078" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3079" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-202-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mn>4</mn><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>8</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>24</mn></mrow><mn>4</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>6</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-3082" style="width: 15.248em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 12.502em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.109em, 1012.46em, 2.666em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3083"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-3084"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.45em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3085" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 0.494em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3086" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3087" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3088" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">a</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3089" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3090" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">4</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3091" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3092" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">8</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3093" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3094" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3095" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS; padding-left: 0.289em;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3096" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">a</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3097" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-3098" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.395em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1001.23em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.465em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.613em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3099"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3100" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3101" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">24</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3102" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.39em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.395em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3103" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3104" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3105" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">6</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.652em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mn>4</mn><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mo>×</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>8</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>∴</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>24</mn></mrow><mn>4</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mn>6</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-202">\rm 4^2+a\times4+8=0\therefore a=\frac{-24}{4}=-6</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-203-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>b</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>6</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>b</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-3106" style="width: 16.355em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 13.404em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.232em, 1013.32em, 2.502em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3107"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3108" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-3109" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.53em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3110" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3111" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3112" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3113" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">a</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3114" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3115" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3116" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">b</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3117" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3118" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3119" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-3120" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.53em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3121" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3122" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3123" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3124" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">6</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3125" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3126" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3127" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">b</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3128" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3129" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3130" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">;</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.353em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">b</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>6</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">b</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>;</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-203">\rm \therefore x^2+ax+b=0\Rightarrow x^2-6x+b=0;</script></span></p>

<p>সমীকরণের মূলদ্বয় সমান হলে,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-204-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>6</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>b</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>b</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>36</mn><mn>4</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>9</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-3131" style="width: 15.904em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 13.035em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1012.99em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3132"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-3133"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.502em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.158em, 1001.97em, 4.387em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3134"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3135" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3136"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3137" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3138" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">6</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3139" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.506em; left: 2.051em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3140" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3141" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3142" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">4</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3143" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3144" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3145" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3146" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">b</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3147" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3148" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3149" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3150" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">b</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3151" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-3152" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.822em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.66em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.367em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3153" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">36</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3154" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.82em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.822em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3155" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3156" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">9</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.702em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>6</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>×</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">b</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">b</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>36</mn><mn>4</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>9</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-204">\rm \left(-6\right)^2-4\times1\times b=0\Rightarrow b=\frac{36}{4}=9</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                                            <span>Question 53 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>গোলাকার ক্লোরোপ্লাস্ট পাওয়া যায় কোনটিতে?</p>

                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>

                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><i>Spirogyra</i></p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>

                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">

                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: <i>Chlamydomonas</i> - পেয়ালাকৃতি; <i>Pithophora</i> - গোলাকার; <i>Zygnema</i> - তারকাকৃতি; <i>Spirogyra</i> - সর্পিলাকার; <i>Ulothrix</i> - ফিতা/ আংটি/ গার্ডলাকৃতির।</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                                    <div class="row">

                                            <span>Question 55 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>যে জিনের কারণে ক্যান্সার রোগ সৃষ্টি হয় তাকে কি বলে?</p>

হোলান্ড্রিক জিন : Y&nbsp;ক্রোমোসোমে অবস্থিত জিন;<br>
খণ্ডিত জিন: ইনট্রন ও এক্সন&nbsp;সহযোগে গঠিত জিন।</p>
