                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: ‘বিদ্রোহী’ কবিতায় কবি সংযুক্ত করেছেন ঔপনিবেশিক শাসনের বিরুদ্ধে কবির ক্ষোভ ও বিদ্রোহ।</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 63 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>“ঘুম চুমু দিয়ে করি নিখিল বিশ্বে নিঝঝুম”- চরণটিতে নজরুলের কোন মনোভাবটি প্রকাশ পেয়েছে?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>শান্তি প্রতিষ্ঠার প্রত্যাশা</p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>প্রবল দ্রোহের চেতনা</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>সম্প্রীতি ও সৌহার্দে্যর আহ্বান</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>প্রচলিত রীতি-নীতির বিরোধিতা</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: ঘুম চুমু দিয়ে প্রকৃতির মতো অকৃত্রিম ভালোবাসায় নিখিল বিশ্বকে নীরব নিঝঝুম করে দিতে পারেন অর্থাৎ শান্তি প্রতিষ্ঠার প্রত্যাশা।</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 64 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>পঞ্চ-পাণ্ডবের দ্বিতীয় পাণ্ডব কে?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>শ্যাম</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>ভীম</p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>পরশুরাম</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>বলরাম</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: মহাভারতের বর্ণিত পাণ্ডব বংশের পাঁচ ভাইকে পঞ্চ পাণ্ডব বলা হয়। এ পাঁচ ভাই হলেন- যুধিষ্ঠির, ভীম, অর্জুন, নকুল ও সহদেব।</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 65 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>‘তান’ শব্দের অর্থ কী?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>

                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">

                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>শোকগীতি</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 66 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>‘বিদ্রোহী’ কবিতাটি কবির কোন কাব্যগ্রন্থ থেকে সংকলিত?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>অগ্নিবীণা</p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>বিষের বাঁশি</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">

                                            </div>

</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 67 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>‘রাজ্ঞী’ এর সন্ধিবিচ্ছেদ কোনটি?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>রাজ্ + নী</p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>রাগ্ + নী</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>রাজ্ + গি</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>রাজন + গি</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: চ্ ও জ্ - এর পরে নাসিক্য ধ্বনি তালব্য হয়। যেমন- রাজ্ + নী = রাজ্ঞী।</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 68 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>কোনটি বাংলা ব্যঞ্জন সন্ধির উদাহরণ?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>তিনেক</p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>কতেক</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>শতেক</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>নিন্দুক</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>হলন্ত ধ্বনির সাথে স্বরধ্বনি যুক্ত হলে স্বরধ্বনির লোপ হয় না। যেমন- তিন+এক = তিনেক। উল্লেখ্য, যে সকল শব্দের শেষের ব্যঞ্জন বর্ণের সাথে স্বরবর্ণটি উচ্চারিত হয় না সেগুলোকে হলন্ত শব্দ বলে। এই নিয়মে তিনেক ব্যঞ্জন সন্ধি।</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 69 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>কোন সন্ধিটি নিপাতনে সিদ্ধ?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>এক্ + দশ = একাদশ</p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>বাক + দান = বাগদান</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>উৎ + ছেদ = উচ্ছেদ</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>সম + সার = সংসার</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p style="margin-bottom:.0001pt; text-align:justify">কতগুলো সন্ধি নিপাতনে সিদ্ধ হয়:</p>

<p>আ + চর্য = আশ্চর্য, তৎ + কর = তস্কর, বৃহৎ + পতি = বৃহস্পতি, মনস্ + ঈষা = মনীষা, এক্ + দশ = একাদশ ইত্যাদি।</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 70 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>‘অধোগতি’ শব্দের সন্ধি বিচ্ছেদ কোনটি?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>অধ + গতি</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>অধঃ + গতি</p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>অধ + অগতি</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>অধঃ + অগতি</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>কতিপয় গুরুত্বপূর্ণ বিসর্গ সন্ধি: পুরঃ + গামী = পুরোগামী;&nbsp;<br>
অধঃ + গমন = অধোগমন; মনঃ + গত = মনোগত;&nbsp;<br>
বয়ঃ + জ্যেষ্ঠ = বয়োজ্যেষ্ঠ; সদ্যঃ + জাত = সদ্যোজাত;&nbsp;<br>
মনঃ + জ = মনোজ; সরঃ + জ = সরোজ; মনঃ + দীপ = মনোদীপ।</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">

                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>“আমার এ দরখাস্তটা পড়ুন” বর্তমানের ‘এ’ অনুজ্ঞা দ্বারা কী বুঝায়?</p>

                                </div>

                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">

                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>

                                            </div>

</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">

                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">

                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>আদেশ</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: আদেশ, অনুরোধ, অনুমতি, প্রার্থনা অনুনয় প্রভৃতি অর্থে বর্তমান এবং ভবিষ্যৎ কালে মধ্যম পুরুষের ক্রিয়াপদের যে রূপ হয় তাকে অনুজ্ঞা পদ বলে। যেমন- আমার এ দরখাস্তটা পড়ুন। এই বাক্যের প্রার্থনা অর্থের অনুজ্ঞার ব্যবহার হয়েছে।</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 79 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>I will not go there if he _______.</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>does not come</p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>would not come</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>did not come</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>has not come</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>First conditional- If + Present Indefinite + ...., sub + Future Indefinite/can/may+v<sub>1</sub>.</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 80 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>“Had I known you were waiting outside, I_____”.</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>would invite you to come in</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>would be inviting you to come in</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>would have invited you to come in</p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>had invited you to come in</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>Third conditional- If + Past Perfect + ...., sub + (would/might/could) have + v<sub>3</sub>.</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>First conditional- If + Present Indefinite + ...., sub + Future Indefinite /can/may + v<sub>1</sub>.</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">

                                        <div class="serial">

    <div class="TakeExamHeader">
        
        
        
        <h2 style="font-size: 25px;">Written Master Set: 1 (Question &amp; Solution)</h2>
    </div>
            <div class="TakeExamBody">
                            <div class="row" style="margin-top:20px;">
                                <h2>Physics (4)</h2>
                            </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">
                                                        <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 1</span>
                                            
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <table border="0" cellpadding="1" cellspacing="1" style="width: 100%;">
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td>একটি সেকেন্ড দোলক A স্থান হতে B স্থানে নিলে এর দোলনকাল 10% বৃদ্ধি পায়। A ও B স্থানে কোনো বস্তুর ওজনের তারতম্য কিরূপ হবে?</td>
			<td style="vertical-align: bottom; text-align: right;">২.৫</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>
</table>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                        <div class="row solveText" style=" display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4; ">

vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.822em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-50" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-51" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.781em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.568em, 1000.66em, 4.305em, -999.998em); top: -4.588em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.326em;"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-52"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.658em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.568em, 1000.33em, 4.305em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-53" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">g</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.371em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-54" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.568em, 1000.66em, 4.305em, -999.998em); top: -3.686em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.326em;"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-55"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.658em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.568em, 1000.33em, 4.305em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-56" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">g</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.371em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-57" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.78em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.781em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-58" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-59" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.191em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1001.03em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.531em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-60" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">121</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1001.03em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.531em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-61" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">100</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.19em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.191em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.897em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mfrac><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">T</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">T</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>11</mn><mn>10</mn></mfrac><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><msqrt><mfrac><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mfrac></msqrt><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>11</mn><mn>10</mn></mfrac><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mfrac><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>121</mn><mn>100</mn></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-2">\rm \Rightarrow\frac{T_2}{T_1}=\frac{11}{10}\Rightarrow\sqrt{\frac{g_1}{g_2}}=\frac{11}{10}\Rightarrow\frac{g_1}{g_2}=\frac{121}{100}</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-3-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mfrac><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mfrac><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>100</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>&amp;#x0025;</mi><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mfrac><mn>121</mn><mn>100</mn></mfrac><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>100</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>&amp;#x0025;</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-62" style="width: 17.666em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 14.469em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.518em, 1014.43em, 3.568em, -999.998em); top: -2.785em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-63"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-64" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⇒</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-65" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-66" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size2;">(</span></span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-67"><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-68"><span style="display: inline-block; top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-70" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">g</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.568em, 1000.66em, 4.305em, -999.998em); top: -3.686em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.326em;"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-72"><span style="display: inline-block; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; position: relative; width: 1.191em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1001.03em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; clip: rect(3.445em, 1001.03em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.531em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-87" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">100</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.19em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.191em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-88" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-89" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">1</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-90" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size1;">)</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-91" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-92" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">100</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-93" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">%</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.789em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.847em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mfrac><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mfrac><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>×</mo><mn>100</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">%</mi><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mfrac><mn>121</mn><mn>100</mn></mfrac><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>×</mo><mn>100</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">%</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-3">\rm \Rightarrow\left(\frac{g_1}{g_2}-1\right)\times100\%=\left(\frac{121}{100}-1\right)\times100\%</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-4-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mfrac><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>w</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>w</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mfrac><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>100</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>&amp;#x0025;</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>21</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>&amp;#x0025;</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-94" style="width: 11.764em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 9.633em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.518em, 1009.59em, 3.568em, -999.998em); top: -2.785em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-95"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-96" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-97" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-98" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size2;">(</span></span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-99"><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-100"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.609em, 1000.82em, 4.264em, -999.998em); top: -4.506em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.408em;"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-101"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.822em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.609em, 1000.49em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-102" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">w</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.891em; left: 0.494em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-103" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.609em, 1000.82em, 4.264em, -999.998em); top: -3.686em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.408em;"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-104"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.822em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.609em, 1000.49em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-105" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">w</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.891em; left: 0.494em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-106" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.95em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-107" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-108" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">1</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-109" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size2;">)</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-110" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-111" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">100</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-112" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">%</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-113" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-114" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">21</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-115" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">%</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.789em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.847em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mfrac><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">w</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">w</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mfrac><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>×</mo><mn>100</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">%</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>21</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">%</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-4">\rm \therefore\left(\frac{w_1}{w_2}-1\right)\times100\%=21\%</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-5-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-116" style="width: 0.658em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.535em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.6em, 1000.49em, 2.379em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-117"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-118" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.753em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-5">\therefore</script></span>&nbsp;A&nbsp;স্থানে কোনো বস্তুর ওজন B&nbsp;স্থানের তুলনায় 21% বেশি হবে।</p>

<p><strong>নম্বর বণ্টনঃ&nbsp;</strong><br>
<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-6-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>T</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>T</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>11</mn><mn>10</mn></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-119" style="width: 3.609em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.953em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.863em, 1002.95em, 2.584em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-120"><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-121"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.82em, 4.264em, -999.998em); top: -4.506em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.408em;"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-122"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.822em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.49em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-123" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">T</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.891em; left: 0.494em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-124" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.82em, 4.264em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.408em;"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-125"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.822em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.49em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-126" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">T</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.891em; left: 0.494em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-127" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.95em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-128" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-129" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.822em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.66em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.367em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-130" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">11</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.7em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.367em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-131" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.82em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.822em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.647em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.852em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mfrac><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">T</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">T</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>11</mn><mn>10</mn></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-6">\rm \frac{T_2}{T_1}=\frac{11}{10}</script></span> নির্ণয়ের জন্য ০.৫ নম্বর।&nbsp;<br>
A স্থানে কোনো বস্তুর ওজন B&nbsp;স্থানের তুলনায় 21% বেশি হবে নির্ণয়ের জন্য ০২ নম্বর।&nbsp;<br>
<strong>[বি.দ্র:</strong> একক না লিখলে বা ভুল একক লিখলে ০.৫ নম্বর কাটা যাবে।]&nbsp;</p>

                                        </div>

                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">
                                                        <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 2</span>
                                            
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <table border="0" cellpadding="1" cellspacing="1" style="width: 100%;">
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td style="text-align: justify;">সরল ছন্দিত গতিসম্পন্ন একটি কণার পর্যায়কাল 0.02 s এবং বিস্তার 0.05 m। বিস্তার অবস্থান থেকে গতির শুরু হলে কণাটির গতির সমীকরণ কিরূপ হবে?</td>
			<td style="vertical-align: bottom; text-align: right;">২.৫</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>
</table>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                        <div class="row solveText" style=" display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4; ">
                                            <p>আদি দশা,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-7-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B4;</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>90</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#xB0;</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>d</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo>;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-132" style="width: 7.666em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 6.273em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1006.19em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-133"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-134" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">δ<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-141" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.535em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.535em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-144" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-145" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">r</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-146" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-147" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">d</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-148" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-149" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">;</span></span><span style="display: inline-block;
