<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-8-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>T</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0.02</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi></mrow><mi>&amp;#x03C9;</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>0.02</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi>&amp;#x03C9;</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi></mrow><mn>0.02</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>100</mn><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>d</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>/</mo></mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-150" style="width: 21.969em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 17.994em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1017.95em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-151"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-152" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">T</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-153" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-154" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0.02</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-155" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-156" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-157" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-158" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.863em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.78em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.367em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-159"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-160" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-161" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">π<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.568em, 1000.41em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.686em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.203em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-162" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">ω</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.86em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.863em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-163" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-164" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0.02</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-165" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-166" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-167" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">ω</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-168" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-169" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.395em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.78em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.367em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-170"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-171" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-172" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">π<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1001.23em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.613em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-173" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">0.02</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.39em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.395em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-174" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-175" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">100</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-176" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">π<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-177" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-178" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">r</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-179" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-180" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">d</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-181"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-182"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-183" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">/</span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-184" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.602em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">T</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0.02</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow><mi>ω</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>0.02</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi>ω</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow><mn>0.02</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>100</mn><mi>π</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>/</mo></mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-8">\rm T=0.02\ s\Rightarrow\frac{2\pi}{\omega}=0.02s\Rightarrow\omega=\frac{2\pi}{0.02}=100\pi\ rad/s</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-9-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-185" style="width: 0.658em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.535em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.6em, 1000.49em, 2.379em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-186"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-187" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.753em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-9">\therefore</script></span>&nbsp;গতির সমীকরণ,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-10-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi><mi>sin</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>&amp;#x03C9;</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B4;</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-188" style="width: 7.625em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 6.232em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.109em, 1006.15em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-189"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-190" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-191" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-192" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">A</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-193" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">sin</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-194"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-195" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-196"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-197"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-198" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-199"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-200" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">ω</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-201" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">t</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-202" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-203" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.207em;">δ<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-204" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>ω</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>δ</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-10">\rm x=A\sin{\left(\omega t+\delta\right)}</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-11-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><mn>0.05</mn><mi>sin</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>100</mn><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi><mn>2</mn></mfrac></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>0.05</mn><mi>cos</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>100</mn><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi></mrow><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-205" style="width: 19.1em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 15.658em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.068em, 1015.66em, 2.543em, -999.998em); top: -2.047em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-206"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-207" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-208" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0.05</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-209" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">sin</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-210"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-211" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-212"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-213"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-214" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size1;">(</span></span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-215"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-216" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">100</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-217" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">π<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-218" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">t</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-219" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-220" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.535em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.609em, 1000.41em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.203em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-221" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">π<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-222" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.53em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.535em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-223" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size1;">)</span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-224" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">m</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-225" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-226" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0.05</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-227" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">cos</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-228"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-229" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-230"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-231" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">100</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-232" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">π<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-233" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">t</span></span></span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-234" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-235" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.051em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.552em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>=</mo><mn>0.05</mn><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>100</mn><mi>π</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>2</mn></mfrac></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>0.05</mn><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>100</mn><mi>π</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi></mrow><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-11">\rm =0.05\sin{\left(100\pi t+\frac{\pi}{2}\right)m}=0.05\cos{100\pi t}\ m</script></span></p>

<p><strong>নম্বর বণ্টনঃ</strong>&nbsp;<br>
<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-12-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03C9;</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>100</mn><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>d</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>/</mo></mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-236" style="width: 6.682em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 5.453em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.109em, 1005.41em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-237"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-238" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">ω</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-239" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-240" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">100</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-241" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">π<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-242" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-243" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">r</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-244" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-245" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">d</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-246"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-247"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-248" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">/</span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-249" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>ω</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>100</mn><mi>π</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>/</mo></mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-12">\rm \omega=100\pi\ rad/s</script></span> জন্য ০১ নম্বর।&nbsp;<br>
<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-13-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0.05</mn><mi>cos</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>100</mn><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi></mrow><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-250" style="width: 8.895em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 7.297em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.191em, 1007.3em, 2.133em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-251"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-252" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-253" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-254" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0.05</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-255" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">cos</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-256"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-257" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-258"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-259" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">100</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-260" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">π<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-261" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">t</span></span></span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-262" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-263" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.098em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.953em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0.05</mn><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>100</mn><mi>π</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi></mrow><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-13">\rm x=0.05\cos{100\pi t}\ m</script></span> নির্ণয়ের জন্য ১.৫ নম্বর।&nbsp;<br>
<strong>[বি.দ্র:</strong> একক না লিখলে বা ভুল একক লিখলে ০.৫ নম্বর কাটা যাবে।]</p>

                                        </div>

                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">
                                                        <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 3</span>

font-family: MathJax_Main;">11</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-300" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">N</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-301"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.357em; left: 0.822em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-303"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-304"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-305" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-306" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-307" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size1;">]</span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.312em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.452em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.593em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow><mo>[</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">Y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>11</mn></mrow></msup><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mo>]</mo></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-16">\rm \left[Y=2\times{10}^{11}Nm^{-2}\right]</script></span></td>
			<td style="vertical-align: bottom; text-align: right;">২.৫</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>
</table>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>

style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 0.986em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-389"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-390"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-391" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-392" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">5</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.698em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.002em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">W</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">Y</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">L</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">L</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">W</mi></mrow><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">Y</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>11</mn></mrow></msup><mo>×</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>6</mn></mrow></msup><mo>×</mo><mn>2.5</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>6</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-17">\rm W=\frac{YAl^2}{2L}\Rightarrow\frac{l}{L}=\frac{2W}{YAl}=\frac{2\times3\times{10}^{-3}}{2\times{10}^{11}\times2\times{10}^{-6}\times2.5\times{10}^{-4}}=6\times{10}^{-5}</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-18-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-393" style="width: 0.658em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.535em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.6em, 1000.49em, 2.379em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-394"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-395" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.753em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-18">\therefore</script></span>&nbsp;শতকরা দৈর্ঘ্য বৃদ্ধি&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-19-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><mn>6</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>&amp;#x0025;</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0.006</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>&amp;#x0025;</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mo>.</mo><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-396" style="width: 13.199em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 10.822em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1010.74em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-397"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-398" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-399" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">6</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-400" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-401" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.969em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.95em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-402"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-403"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-404" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 0.986em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-405"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-406"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-407" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-408" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-409" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">%</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-410" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-411" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0.006</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-412" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">%</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-413" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-414" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-415" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">A</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-416" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">n</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-417" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-418" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">.</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-419" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">)</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.453em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>=</mo><mn>6</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mi mathvariant="normal">%</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0.006</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">%</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mo>.</mo><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-19">\rm =6\times{10}^{-3}\%=0.006\%\ (Ans.)</script></span></p>

<p><strong>নম্বর বণ্টনঃ</strong></p>

<p><strong><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-20-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>L</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>6</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-420" style="width: 5.863em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.797em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.945em, 1004.8em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-421"><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-422"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.576em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.21em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.08em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-423" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">l</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.41em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.203em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-424" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">L</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.58em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.576em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-425" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-426" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">6</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-427" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-428" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.969em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.95em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-429"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-430"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-431" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 0.986em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-432"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-433"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-434" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-435" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">5</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.652em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">L</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>6</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-20">\rm \frac{l}{L}=6\times{10}^{-5}</script></span></strong>&nbsp;নির্ণয়ের জন্য ০২ নম্বর।</p>

<p>শতকরা দৈর্ঘ্য বৃদ্ধি <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-21-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><mn>0.006</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>&amp;#x0025;</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-436" style="width: 4.223em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.445em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.109em, 1003.4em, 2.133em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-437"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-438" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-439" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0.006</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-440" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">%</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.098em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.103em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>=</mo><mn>0.006</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">%</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-21">=0.006\%</script></span> নির্ণয়ের জন্য ০.৫ নম্বর।<br>
<strong>[বি.দ্র:</strong> একক না লিখলে বা ভুল একক লিখলে ০.৫ নম্বর কাটা যাবে।]</p>

                                        </div>

                            </div>
                        </div>

display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-23-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>3</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mn>4</mn></msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-456" style="width: 4.771em; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-24-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mn>10</mn><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-466" style="width: 2.982em; top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-467"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-468"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.424em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.859em, 1000.82em, 1.157em, -999.998em); 			<td style="vertical-align: bottom; text-align: right;">২.৫</td>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                        <div class="row solveText" style=" display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4; ">
                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-25-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi><mo>=</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mn>10</mn><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi></msup><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>18</mn></mfrac><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>d</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-476" style="width: 8.117em; <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-26-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>F</mi><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mn>4</mn></msup></mrow><mrow><mn>2.5</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mfrac><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>18</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>2.16</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mn>8</mn></msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mo>.</mo><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-495" style="width: 22.174em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 18.158em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1018.08em, 2.83em, -999.998em); width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.822em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-539"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-540"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-541" style="font-size: 70.7%; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.952em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mi>θ</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mn>4</mn></msup></mrow><mrow><mn>2.5</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mfrac><mo>×</mo><mn>18</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>2.16</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mn>8</mn></msup><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mo>.</mo><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-26">\rm \therefore n=\frac{F}{A\theta}=\frac{3\times{10}^4}{2.5\times{10}^{-3}}\times18=2.16\times{10}^8Nm^{-2}(Ans.)</script></span></p>

<p><strong>নম্বর বণ্টনঃ</strong>&nbsp;<br>
<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-27-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>18</mn></mfrac><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>d</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-549" style="width: 4.346em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.568em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1003.53em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-550"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-551" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">θ</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-552" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-553" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.822em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.29em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-554" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.7em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.367em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-555" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">18</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.82em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.822em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-556" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">r</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-557" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-558" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">d</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.602em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>θ</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>18</mn></mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-27">\rm \theta=\frac{1}{18}rad</script></span> নির্ণয়ের জন্য ০.৫ নম্বর।<br>
<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-28-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2.16</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mn>8</mn></msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-559" style="width: 8.855em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 7.256em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1007.26em, 2.133em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-560"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-561" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">n</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-562" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-563" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">2.16</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-564" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-565" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.436em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.95em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-566"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-567"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-568" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 0.986em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-569" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">8</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-570" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">N</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-571"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.805em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.82em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-572" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.822em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-573"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-574"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-575" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-576" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.098em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.203em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2.16</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mn>8</mn></msup><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-28">\rm n = 2.16\times{10}^8Nm^{-2}</script></span> নির্ণয়ের জন্য ০২ নম্বর।<br>
<strong>[বি.দ্র:</strong> একক না লিখলে বা ভুল একক লিখলে ০.৫ নম্বর কাটা যাবে।]</p>

                                        </div>

                            </div>
                        </div>
                            <div class="row" style="margin-top:20px;">
                                <h2>Chemistry (4)</h2>
                            </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">
                                                        <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 5</span>
                                            
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <table border="0" cellpadding="1" cellspacing="1" style="width: 100%;">
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td>(a) বাস্তব গ্যাস কী? (০১)<br>
			(b) <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-29-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>68</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mn>3</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-577" style="width: 4.51em; position: relative; width: 1.194em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.206em, 1000.71em, 4.1em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-584" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">H</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.836em; left: 0.747em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-585" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.316em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.184em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>68</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi><mn>3</mn></msub></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-29">\rm 68g\ NH_3</script></span> গ্যাসের জন্য ভ্যান্ডার ওয়ালস সমীকরণটি লিখ। (১.৫)</td>
			<td style="vertical-align: bottom; text-align: right;">২.৫</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                        <div class="row solveText" style=" display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4; ">
                                            <p>(a) যেসব গ্যাস বাস্তবে পাওয়া যায় এবং গ্যাসের সূত্রসমূহ সঠিকভাবে মেনে চলে না তাদেরকে বাস্তব গ্যাস বলে।</p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-30-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>b</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>68</mn><mn>17</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-586" style="width: 8.076em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 6.6em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1006.6em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-587"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-588" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-589" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">b</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-590" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-591" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-592" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">n</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-593" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-594" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.822em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.7em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.367em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-595" style="font-size: 70.7%; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.82em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.822em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-597" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-598" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">4</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-599" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-600" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">o</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-601" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">l</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.652em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">b</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>68</mn><mn>17</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-30">\rm (b)\ n=\frac{68}{17}=4mol</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-31-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>P</mi><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mrow><msup><mn>4</mn><mn>2</mn></msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi></mrow><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>V</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>V</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>4</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>b</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>R</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>T</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>P</mi><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>16</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi></mrow><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>V</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>V</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>4</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>b</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>R</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>T</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-602" style="width: 26.273em; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-651" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">4</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-652" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">b</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-653" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-654" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-655" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">4</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-656" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">R</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-657" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">T</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-658" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.789em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.847em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mrow><msup><mn>4</mn><mn>2</mn></msup><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi></mrow><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">b</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">R</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">T</mi><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>16</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi></mrow><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">b</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">R</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">T</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-31">\rm \therefore\left(P+\frac{4^2a}{V^2}\right)\left(V-4b\right)=4RT\Rightarrow\left(P+\frac{16a}{V^2}\right)\left(V-4b\right)=4RT\ </script></span></p>

<p><strong>নম্বর বণ্টন:</strong><br>
(a) বাস্তব গ্যাসের সংজ্ঞা লেখার জন্য ০১ নম্বর।<br>
(b) <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-32-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>P</mi><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>16</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi></mrow><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>V</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>V</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>4</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>b</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>R</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>T</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-659" style="width: 11.764em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 9.633em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.518em, 1009.59em, 3.568em, -999.998em); top: -2.785em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-660"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-661"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-662" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size2;">(</span></span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-663"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-664" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">P</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-665" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-666" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.191em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1001.07em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.531em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-667"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-668" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">16</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-669" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.281em, 1000.82em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.523em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.408em;"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-670"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.822em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.53em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-671" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">V</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.301em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-672" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.19em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.191em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-673" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size2;">)</span></span></span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-674" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-675" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-676"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-677" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">V</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-678" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-679" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">4</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-680" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">b</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-681" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-682" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; width: 0px; height: 2.789em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.847em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>16</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi></mrow><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">b</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">R</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">T</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-32">\rm \left(P+\frac{16a}{V^2}\right)\left(V-4b\right)=4RT</script></span>&nbsp;; নির্ণয়ের জন্য ১.৫ নম্বর।</p>

                                        </div>

                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">
                                                        <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 6</span>
                                            
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">

	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td><strong>উপযু্&zwnj;ক্ত বিক্রিয়ার সাহায্যে উভধর্মিতা প্রমাণ কর:</strong></td>
			<td style="vertical-align: bottom; text-align: right;">২.৫</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>
</table>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-33-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>P</mi><msubsup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mn>4</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>2</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo></mrow></msubsup><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>S</mi><msubsup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mn>4</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo></msubsup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-686" style="width: 17.55em;                                         <div class="row solveText" style=" display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4; ">
                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-34-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><munder><mrow><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi></mrow><mstyle mathsize=&quot;1.44em&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>b</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>e</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo></mstyle></munder><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi><mo class=&quot;MJX-variant&quot; stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21CC;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo></msup><mo>+</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mo>+</mo></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-731" style="width: 13.977em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 11.436em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.273em, 1011.44em, 3.732em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-732"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-733" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-734" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">i</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-735" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-736" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="munder" id="MathJax-Span-737"><span style="display: inline-block; font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-746" style="font-size: 101.8%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">b</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-747" style="font-size: 101.8%; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-752" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">H</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-753" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-754" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">l</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-755" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS; <p>(ii)&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-36-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>P</mi><msubsup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mn>4</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>2</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo></mrow></msubsup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-801" style="width: 3.199em; <p>অম্লরূপে&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-37-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>P</mi><msubsup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mn>4</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>2</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo></mrow></msubsup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-812" style="width: 3.199em; font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1025" style="font-size: 101.8%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1026" style="font-size: 101.8%;
