overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -1.648em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.702em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><munder><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">S</mi><msubsup><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi><mn>4</mn><mo>−</mo></msubsup></mrow><mstyle mathsize="1.44em"><mi mathvariant="normal">b</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi></mstyle></munder><mo>+</mo><munder><mrow><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msubsup><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi><mn>6</mn><mo>+</mo></msubsup></mrow><mstyle mathsize="1.44em"><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi></mstyle></munder><mo class="MJX-variant" stretchy="false">⇌</mo><munder><mrow><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi mathvariant="normal">S</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi></mrow><mn>4</mn></msub></mrow><mstyle mathsize="1.44em"><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi></mstyle></munder><mo>+</mo><munder><mrow><msubsup><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo></msubsup><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi><mn>5</mn></msub></mrow><mstyle mathsize="1.44em"><mi mathvariant="normal">b</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi></mstyle></munder></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-42">\rm \underset{\Large base}{HSO_4^-}+\underset{\Large acid}{N_2H_6^+}\rightleftharpoons \underset{\Large acid}{H_2{\rm SO}_4}+\underset{\Large base}{N_2^+H_5}</script></span></p>

<p><strong>নম্বর বণ্টন:</strong><br>
৩টি যৌগের উভধর্মিতা প্রমাণ করার জন্য ২.৫ নম্বর।<br>
২টি যৌগের উভধর্মিতা প্রমাণ করার জন্য ০২ নম্বর।<br>
১টি যৌগের উভধর্মিতা প্রমাণ করার জন্য ০১ নম্বর।</p>

                                        </div>

                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">
                                                        <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 7</span>
                                            
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <table border="0" cellpadding="1" cellspacing="1" style="width: 100%;">
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td>(a) ডাল্টনের আংশিক চাপ সূত্র লিখ। (০১)<br>
			(b) গ্যাসের গড় বেগ, সম্ভাব্যতম বেগ ও RMS বেগকে সাংখ্যিক মানের ক্রমানুসারে সাজাও। (১.৫)</td>
			<td style="vertical-align: bottom; text-align: right;">২.৫</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>
</table>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                        <div class="row solveText" style=" display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4; ">
                                            <p style="text-align: justify;"><strong>(a) ডাল্টনের আংশিক চাপ সূত্রের বিবৃতি হলো:</strong><br>
কোনো নির্দিষ্ট তাপমাত্রায় বিক্রিয়াবিহীন কোনো গ্যাস মিশ্রণের কোনো একটি উপাদান গ্যাস ঐ তাপমাত্রায় মিশ্রণের সমস্ত আয়তন একাকী দখল করলে যে চাপ প্রয়োগ করত, তাকে ঐ উপাদান গ্যাসের আংশিক চাপ বলা হয়। ঐ গ্যাস মিশ্রণের মোট চাপ ঐ তাপমাত্রায় তার উপাদান গ্যাসসমূহের আংশিক চাপসমূহের যোগফলের সমান।</p>

<p>(b)&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-43-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>R</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>M</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>S</mi></mrow></msub><mo>&amp;gt;</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>v</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi></mrow></msub><mo>&amp;gt;</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1027" style="width: 7.625em; <p><strong>নম্বর বণ্টন:</strong><br>
(a) ডাল্টনের আংশিক চাপ সূত্রটি লেখার জন্য ০১ নম্বর।<br>
(b) <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-46-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>R</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>M</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>S</mi></mrow></msub><mo>&amp;gt;</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>v</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi></mrow></msub><mo>&amp;gt;</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1061" style="width: 7.625em; top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1062"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1063"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.379em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.74em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1065"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1066"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1067" style="font-size: 70.7%; লেখার জন্য ১.৫ নম্বর।</p>

                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">
                                                        <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 8</span>
                                            
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <table border="0" cellpadding="1" cellspacing="1" style="width: 100%;">
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td style="text-align: justify;">কোনো নির্দিষ্ট তাপমাত্রা ও চাপে একটি সূক্ষ্ম ছিদ্রপথ দিয়ে <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-47-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>160</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1080" style="width: 6em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.92em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.306em, 1004.92em, 2.498em, -999.998em); position: relative; width: 1.269em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.43em, 1000.82em, 4.1em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1086" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.357em; left: 0.822em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1087" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1088" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1089"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.194em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.169em, 1000.71em, 4.137em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1090" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">O</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.836em; left: 0.784em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1091" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.225em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.275em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>160</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-47">\rm 160\ cm^3\ O_2</script></span> পরিব্যাপ্ত হতে 100s সময় লাগে। একই অবস্থায় একই পথ দিয়ে <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-48-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>640</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1092" style="width: 6em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.92em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.306em, 1004.92em, 2.498em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1093"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1094" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">640</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1095" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1096" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">c</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1097"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1100" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1101"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.836em; left: 0.747em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1103" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; 			<td style="vertical-align: bottom; text-align: right;">২.৫</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>
</table>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                        <div class="row solveText" style=" display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4; ">

xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mfrac><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mrow></msub><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mrow></msub></mfrac><mo>=</mo><msqrt><mfrac><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">M</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mrow></msub><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">M</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><msub><mi class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mn>3</mn></msup></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>/</mo></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-51">\rm \frac{r_{H_2}}{r_{O_2}}=\sqrt{\frac{M_{O_2}}{M_{H_2}}}\Rightarrow\frac{r_{H_2}}{1.6}=\ \sqrt{\frac{32}{2}}\Rightarrow r_{H_2}=4\times1.6\ {cm^3}/{s}</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-52-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>6.4</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>/</mo></mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1217" style="width: 7.748em; <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-53-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1238" style="width: 0.658em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.535em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.6em, 1000.49em, 2.379em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1239"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1240" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.753em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-53">\therefore</script></span>&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; <p><strong>নম্বর বণ্টন:</strong><br>

width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.897em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mfrac><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mrow></msub><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mrow></msub></mfrac><mo>=</mo><msqrt><mfrac><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mrow></msub><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mrow></msub></mfrac></msqrt></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-57">\rm \frac{r_{H_2}}{r_{O_2}}=\sqrt{\frac{m_{O_2}}{m_{H_2}}}</script></span> সূত্র লেখার জন্য ০.৫ নম্বর।<br>
<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-58-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>6.4</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>/</mo></mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1321" style="width: 6.805em; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.412em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1325"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1326"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1327"><span style="display: inline-block; font-family: MathJax_Main;">H</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.891em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1329" style="font-size: 50%; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1337"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1338"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1339" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">/</span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1340" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-59-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>640</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1341" style="width: 4.428em; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-60-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><mn>640</mn><mn>6.4</mn></mfrac><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>100</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1351" style="width: 5.125em;                             </div>
                        </div>
                            <div class="row" style="margin-top:20px;">
                                <h2>Higher Mathematics (4)</h2>
                            </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 9</span>

font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.392em, 1000.45em, 4.1em, -999.998em); top: -3.687em; left: 0.449em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1392" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1393" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1394" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1395" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">2.</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.407em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.502em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msubsup><mi mathvariant="normal">z</mi><mn>1</mn><mn>3</mn></msubsup><mo>+</mo><msubsup><mi mathvariant="normal">z</mi><mn>2</mn><mn>3</mn></msubsup><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mn>2.</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-64">\rm z_1^3+z_2^3=-2.</script></span></td>
			<td style="vertical-align: bottom; text-align: right;">২.৫</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>
</table>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                        <div class="row solveText" style=" display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4; ">
                                            <p>দেওয়া আছে,&nbsp;&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-65-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1396" style="width: 5.576em; <p>এর জটিল মূলদ্বয়&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-67-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>z</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1419" style="width: 0.863em; <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-71-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>L</mi><mo>.</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mo>.</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>S</mi><mo>.</mo><mo>=</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><msubsup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>z</mi><mn>1</mn><mn>3</mn></msubsup><mo>+</mo><msubsup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>z</mi><mn>2</mn><mn>3</mn></msubsup><mo>=</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>z</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>z</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>z</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>z</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>z</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>z</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1452" style="width: 20.371em; <p><strong>নম্বর বণ্টনঃ</strong><br>

নির্ণয়ের জন্য ১.৫ নম্বর।</p>

                                        </div>

                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1638" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1639" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">p</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1640" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1641" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1642" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.602em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo><mi>α</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>α</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">p</mi><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>α</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">p</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi>α</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">p</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-81">\rm \therefore\alpha+\alpha+1=p\Rightarrow2\alpha=p-1\Rightarrow\alpha=\frac{1}{2}(p-1)</script></span></p>

<p>এবং&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-82-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>q</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><msup><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>q</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1643" style="width: 12.174em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 9.961em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1009.96em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1644"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1645" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">α</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1646" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1647" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1648"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1649" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">α</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1650" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1651" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">1</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1652" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1653" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1654" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">q<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1655" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1656" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.068em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.658em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1658" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1659" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1660" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.207em;">α</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1661" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1662" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">q<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.403em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>α</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>α</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">q</mi><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><msup><mi>α</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mi>α</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">q</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-82">\rm \alpha\left(\alpha+1\right)=q\Rightarrow\alpha^2+\alpha=q</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-83-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>4</mn></mfrac><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>p</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>p</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>q</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1663" style="width: 12.297em; <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-84-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>p</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>p</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>p</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>4</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>q</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1691" style="width: 14.223em; top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1692"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1693" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⇒</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1694" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.986em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.53em, 4.346em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1695" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">p</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.576em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1696" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1697" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1698" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1711" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.353em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">p</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">p</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">p</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">q</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-84">\rm \Rightarrow p^2-2p+1+2p-2-4q=0</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-85-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>p</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>4</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>q</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1712" style="width: 8.076em; padding-left: 0.207em;">4</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1720" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">q<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1721" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; <p><strong>নম্বর বণ্টনঃ</strong><br>
<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-86-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>p</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1725" style="width: 5.781em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.715em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1004.63em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1726"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1727" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">α</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1728" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1729" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.29em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1730" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1731" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1732" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1733" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">p</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1734" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1735" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1736" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.602em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>α</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">p</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-86">\rm \alpha=\frac{1}{2}(p-1)</script></span>&nbsp;; নির্ণয়ের জন্য ০. ৫ নম্বর।&nbsp;<br>
<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-87-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>q</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1737" style="width: 4.797em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.936em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1003.94em, 2.297em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1738"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1739"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.068em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.62em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1740" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">α</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.658em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1741" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1742" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1743" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.207em;">α</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1744" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1745" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">q<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.353em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mi>α</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mi>α</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">q</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-87">\rm \alpha^2+\alpha=q</script></span>&nbsp;; নির্ণয়ের জন্য ০. ৫ নম্বর।<br>
<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-88-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>p</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>4</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>q</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1746" style="width: 6.764em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 5.535em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1005.49em, 2.297em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1747"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1748"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.986em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.576em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1750" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1751" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1752" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">4</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1753" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">q<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1754" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.353em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">p</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">q</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-88">\rm p^2-4q-1=0</script></span>&nbsp;; নির্ণয়ের জন্য ১. ৫ নম্বর।</p>

                                        </div>

                            </div>
                        </div>

                                        <div class="row solveText" style=" display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4; ">
                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-93-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>p</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>q</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1799" style="width: 6.805em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 5.576em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1005.53em, 2.297em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1800"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1801"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.53em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1802" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1803" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1804" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1805" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">p</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1806" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1807" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1808" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">q<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1809" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1810" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1894" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1895" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.552em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>α</mi><mo>−</mo><mi>β</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>α</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>β</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn><mi>α</mi><mi>β</mi><mo>=</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">p</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">q</mi><mo>=</mo><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">p</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">q</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-96">\rm \left(\alpha-\beta\ \right)^2=\left(\alpha+\beta\ \right)^2-4\alpha\beta=\left(-p\right)^2-4q=p^2-4q</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-97-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1897" style="width: 0.658em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.535em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.6em, 1000.49em, 2.379em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1898"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1899" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.753em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-97">\therefore</script></span>&nbsp;মূলদ্বয়ের যোগফল&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-98-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>p</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>4</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>q</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1900" style="width: 4.756em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.895em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1003.89em, 2.297em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1901"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1902" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1903" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">2</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1904"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.986em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.53em, 4.346em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1905" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">p</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.576em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1906" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1907" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1908" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">4</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1909" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">q<span style="display: inline-block; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.353em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">p</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">q</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-98">\rm =2p^2-4q</script></span></p>

<p>মূলদ্বয়ের গুণফল&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-99-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>p</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>p</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>4</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>q</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>p</mi><mn>4</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>4</mn><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>p</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>q</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1910" style="width: 11.928em; <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-100-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1936" style="width: 0.658em; <p><strong>নম্বর বণ্টনঃ</strong><br>
মূলদ্বয়ের যোগফল <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-102-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>p</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>4</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>q</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1969" style="width: 4.756em; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1977" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">4</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1978" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">q<span style="display: inline-block; মূলদ্বয়ের গুণফল <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-103-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>p</mi><mn>4</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>4</mn><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>p</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>q</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1979" style="width: 5.248em; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1985" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1986" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-104-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>2</mn><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>p</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>4</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>q</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>+</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>p</mi><mn>4</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>4</mn><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>p</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>q</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1991" style="width: 14.715em;                                             <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-108-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B2;</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B3;</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mfrac><msup><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mrow><mi>&amp;#x03B2;</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B3;</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><msup><mi>&amp;#x03B2;</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mrow><mi>&amp;#x03B3;</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><msup><mi>&amp;#x03B3;</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mrow><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B2;</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msup><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><msup><mi>&amp;#x03B2;</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B2;</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><msup><mi>&amp;#x03B3;</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B3;</mi></mrow></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2053" style="width: 22.625em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 18.527em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1018.53em, 2.83em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2054"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2055" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">α</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2056" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2058" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2059" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.207em;">γ<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2060" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2061" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2062" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS; padding-left: 0.289em;">∴</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-2063" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; vertical-align: -0.698em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.152em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>α</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>β</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>γ</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>∴</mo><mfrac><msup><mi>α</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mrow><mi>β</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>γ</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><msup><mi>β</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mrow><mi>γ</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>α</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><msup><mi>γ</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mrow><mi>α</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>β</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msup><mi>α</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mrow><mo>−</mo><mi>α</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><msup><mi>β</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mrow><mo>−</mo><mi>β</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><msup><mi>γ</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mrow><mo>−</mo><mi>γ</mi></mrow></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-108">\rm \alpha+\beta+\gamma=0 \therefore\frac{\alpha^2}{\beta+\gamma}+\frac{\beta^2}{\gamma+\alpha}+\frac{\gamma^2}{\alpha+\beta}=\frac{\alpha^2}{-\alpha}+\frac{\beta^2}{-\beta}+\frac{\gamma^2}{-\gamma} </script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-109-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B2;</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B3;</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B2;</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B3;</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>0.</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2113" style="width: 15.371em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 12.584em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.109em, 1012.5em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2114"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2115" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2116" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2117" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">α</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2118" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2119" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.207em;">β<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2120" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2121" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.207em;">γ<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2122" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2123" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">−</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2124" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2125" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2126"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2127" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">α</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2128" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2129" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.207em;">β<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; padding-left: 0.207em;">γ<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2132" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2133" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2134" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0.</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mi>α</mi><mo>−</mo><mi>β</mi><mo>−</mo><mi>γ</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>α</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>β</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>γ</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>0.</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-109">\rm =-\alpha-\beta-\gamma=-\left(\alpha+\beta+\gamma\right)=0.</script></span></p>

<p><strong>নম্বর বণ্টনঃ</strong></p>

<p><strong><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-110-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><msup><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mrow><mi>&amp;#x03B2;</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B3;</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><msup><mi>&amp;#x03B2;</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mrow><mi>&amp;#x03B3;</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><msup><mi>&amp;#x03B3;</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mrow><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B2;</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2135" style="width: 9.51em;
